items.title: Plasma Sets Sept. 25 Mainnet Beta and XPL Debut Amid Surging Stablecoin Demand
items.excerpt: Plasma will launch its mainnet beta on Thursday, Sept. 25 at 8:00 am ET, introducing XPL alongside deep USDT integrations. Backed by Bitfinex and Peter Thielâ€™s Founders Fund, the rollout lands amid rapid vault uptake and fresh capital commitments across the stablecoin ecosystem.
